verses.verse: בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> old שְׁתֵּ֨ים <S%H8147><s%> both עֶשְׂרֵ֤ה <S%H6240><s%> ten שָׁנָה֙ <S%H8141><s%> years מְנַשֶּׁ֣ה <S%H4519><s%> Manasseh בְמָלְכ֔וֹ <S%H4427><s%> when he began to reign וַחֲמִשִּׁ֤ים <S%H2572><s%> fifty וְחָמֵשׁ֙ <S%H2568><s%> and five שָׁנָ֔ה <S%H8141><s%> years מָלַ֖ךְ <S%H4427><s%> and reigned בִּירוּשָׁלִָ֑ם <S%H3389><s%> in Jerusalem וְשֵׁ֥ם <S%H8034><s%> name אִמּ֖וֹ <S%H517><s%> And his mother's חֶפְצִי־ בָֽהּ׃ <S%H2657><s%> [was] Hephzibah

וַיַּ֥עַשׂ <S%H6213><s%> And he did הָרַ֖ע <S%H7451><s%> [that which was] evil בְּעֵינֵ֣י <S%H5869><s%> in the sight יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD כְּתֽוֹעֲבֹת֙ <S%H8441><s%> after the abominations הַגּוֹיִ֔ם <S%H1471><s%> of the heathen אֲשֶׁר֙ <S%H834><s%> whom הוֹרִ֣ישׁ <S%H3423><s%> cast out יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> whom the LORD מִפְּנֵ֖י <S%H6440><s%> before בְּנֵ֥י <S%H1121><s%> the children יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <S%H3478><s%> of Israel

וַיָּ֗שָׁב <S%H7725><s%> again וַיִּ֙בֶן֙ <S%H1129><s%> For he built up אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַבָּמ֔וֹת <S%H1116><s%> the high places אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> which אִבַּ֖ד <S%H6><s%> had destroyed חִזְקִיָּ֣הוּ <S%H2396><s%> which Hezekiah אָבִ֑יו <S%H1><s%> his father וַיָּ֨קֶם <S%H6965><s%> and he reared up מִזְבְּחֹ֜ת <S%H4196><s%> altars לַבַּ֗עַל <S%H1168><s%> for Baal וַיַּ֤עַשׂ <S%H6213><s%> and made אֲשֵׁרָה֙ <S%H842><s%> a grove כַּאֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> which עָשָׂ֗ה <S%H6213><s%> as did אַחְאָב֙ <S%H256><s%> Ahab מֶ֣לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> king יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel וַיִּשְׁתַּ֙חוּ֙ <S%H7812><s%> and worshipped לְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> all צְבָ֣א <S%H6635><s%> all the host הַשָּׁמַ֔יִם <S%H8064><s%> of heaven וַֽיַּעֲבֹ֖ד <S%H5647><s%> and served אֹתָֽם׃ <S%H853><s%>

וּבָנָ֥ה <S%H1129><s%> And he built מִזְבְּחֹ֖ת <S%H4196><s%> altars בְּבֵ֣ית <S%H1004><s%> in the house יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD אֲשֶׁר֙ <S%H834><s%> of which אָמַ֣ר <S%H559><s%> said יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> of which the LORD בִּירוּשָׁלִַ֖ם <S%H3389><s%> In Jerusalem אָשִׂ֥ים <S%H7760><s%> will I put אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> שְׁמִֽי׃ <S%H8034><s%> my name

וַיִּ֥בֶן <S%H1129><s%> And he built מִזְבְּח֖וֹת <S%H4196><s%> altars לְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> for all צְבָ֣א <S%H6635><s%> for all the host הַשָּׁמָ֑יִם <S%H8064><s%> of heaven בִּשְׁתֵּ֖י <S%H8147><s%> in the two חַצְר֥וֹת <S%H2691><s%> courts בֵּית־ <S%H1004><s%> of the house יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD

וְהֶעֱבִ֤יר <S%H5674><s%> pass אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> בְּנוֹ֙ <S%H1121><s%> And he made his son בָּאֵ֔שׁ <S%H784><s%> through the fire וְעוֹנֵ֣ן <S%H6049><s%> and observed times וְנִחֵ֔שׁ <S%H5172><s%> and used enchantments וְעָ֥שָׂה <S%H6213><s%> and dealt א֖וֹב <S%H178><s%> with familiar spirits וְיִדְּעֹנִ֑ים <S%H3049><s%> and wizards הִרְבָּ֗ה <S%H7235><s%> much לַעֲשׂ֥וֹת <S%H6213><s%> he wrought הָרַ֛ע <S%H7451><s%> wickedness בְּעֵינֵ֥י <S%H5869><s%> in the sight יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD לְהַכְעִֽיס׃ <S%H3707><s%> to provoke [him] to anger

וַיָּ֕שֶׂם <S%H7760><s%> And he set אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> פֶּ֥סֶל <S%H6459><s%> a graven image הָאֲשֵׁרָ֖ה <S%H842><s%> of the grove אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> of which עָשָׂ֑ה <S%H6213><s%> that he had made בַּבַּ֗יִת <S%H1004><s%> in the house אֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> which אָמַ֤ר <S%H559><s%> said יְהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> of which the LORD אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to דָּוִד֙ <S%H1732><s%> to David וְאֶל־ <S%H413><s%> about שְׁלֹמֹ֣ה <S%H8010><s%> and to Solomon בְנ֔וֹ <S%H1121><s%> his son בַּבַּ֨יִת <S%H1004><s%> In this house הַזֶּ֜ה <S%H2088><s%> this וּבִירוּשָׁלִַ֗ם <S%H3389><s%> and in Jerusalem אֲשֶׁ֤ר <S%H834><s%> which בָּחַ֙רְתִּי֙ <S%H977><s%> which I have chosen מִכֹּל֙ <S%H3605><s%> all שִׁבְטֵ֣י <S%H7626><s%> out of all tribes יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel אָשִׂ֥ים <S%H7760><s%> will I put אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> שְׁמִ֖י <S%H8034><s%> my name לְעוֹלָֽם׃ <S%H5769><s%> for ever

וְלֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> not אֹסִ֗יף <S%H3254><s%> any more לְהָנִיד֙ <S%H5110><s%> move רֶ֣גֶל <S%H7272><s%> Neither will I make the feet יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> from הָ֣אֲדָמָ֔ה <S%H127><s%> out of the land אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> which נָתַ֖תִּי <S%H5414><s%> which I gave לַֽאֲבוֹתָ֑ם <S%H1><s%> their fathers רַ֣ק ׀ <S%H7535><s%> but אִם־ <S%H518><s%> if יִשְׁמְר֣וּ <S%H8104><s%> only if they will observe לַעֲשׂ֗וֹת <S%H6213><s%> to do כְּכֹל֙ <S%H3605><s%> to all אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> which צִוִּיתִ֔ים <S%H6680><s%> according to all that I have commanded וּלְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> to all הַ֨תּוֹרָ֔ה <S%H8451><s%> them and according to all the law אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> which צִוָּ֥ה <S%H6680><s%> commanded אֹתָ֖ם <S%H853><s%> עַבְדִּ֥י <S%H5650><s%> that my servant מֹשֶֽׁה׃ <S%H4872><s%> Moses

וְלֹ֖א <S%H3808><s%> did not שָׁמֵ֑עוּ <S%H8085><s%> But they hearkened וַיַּתְעֵ֤ם <S%H8582><s%> seduced מְנַשֶּׁה֙ <S%H4519><s%> not and Manasseh לַעֲשׂ֣וֹת <S%H6213><s%> them to do אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הָרָ֔ע <S%H7451><s%> more evil מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> more הַ֨גּוֹיִ֔ם <S%H1471><s%> than did the nations אֲשֶׁר֙ <S%H834><s%> whom הִשְׁמִ֣יד <S%H8045><s%> destroyed יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> whom the LORD מִפְּנֵ֖י <S%H6440><s%> before בְּנֵ֥י <S%H1121><s%> the children יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <S%H3478><s%> of Israel
וַיְדַבֵּ֧ר <S%H1696><s%> spake יְהוָ֛ה <S%H3068><s%> And the LORD בְּיַד־ <S%H3027><s%> by עֲבָדָ֥יו <S%H5650><s%> his servants הַנְּבִיאִ֖ים <S%H5030><s%> the prophets לֵאמֹֽר׃ <S%H559><s%> saying

יַעַן֩ <S%H3282><s%> because אֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> who עָשָׂ֜ה <S%H6213><s%> hath done מְנַשֶּׁ֤ה <S%H4519><s%> Because Manasseh מֶֽלֶךְ־ <S%H4428><s%> king יְהוּדָה֙ <S%H3063><s%> of Judah הַתֹּעֵב֣וֹת <S%H8441><s%> these abominations הָאֵ֔לֶּה <S%H428><s%> these הֵרַ֕ע <S%H7489><s%> [and] hath done wickedly מִכֹּ֛ל <S%H3605><s%> all אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> who עָשׂ֥וּ <S%H6213><s%> did הָאֱמֹרִ֖י <S%H567><s%> above all that the Amorites אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> who לְפָנָ֑יו <S%H6440><s%> which [were] before וַיַּחֲטִ֥א <S%H2398><s%> also to sin גַֽם־ <S%H1571><s%> also אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> יְהוּדָ֖ה <S%H3063><s%> him and hath made Judah בְּגִלּוּלָֽיו׃ <S%H1544><s%> with his idols פ

לָכֵ֗ן <S%H3651><s%> therefore כֹּֽה־ <S%H3541><s%> thus אָמַ֤ר <S%H559><s%> Therefore thus saith יְהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> the LORD אֱלֹהֵ֣י <S%H430><s%> God יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel הִנְנִי֙ <S%H2005><s%> behold מֵבִ֣יא <S%H935><s%> Behold I [am] bringing רָעָ֔ה <S%H7451><s%> [such] evil עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> on יְרוּשָׁלִַ֖ם <S%H3389><s%> upon Jerusalem וִֽיהוּדָ֑ה <S%H3063><s%> and Judah אֲשֶׁר֙ <S%H834><s%> that כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> whoever [שֹׁמְעָיו כ] (שֹׁ֣מְעָ֔הּ <S%H8085><s%> listen ק) תִּצַּ֖לְנָה <S%H6750><s%> shall tingle שְׁתֵּ֥י <S%H8147><s%> of it both אָזְנָֽיו׃ <S%H241><s%> his ears

וְנָטִ֣יתִי <S%H5186><s%> And I will stretch עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> over יְרוּשָׁלִַ֗ם <S%H3389><s%> over Jerusalem אֵ֚ת <S%H853><s%> קָ֣ו <S%H6957><s%> the line שֹֽׁמְר֔וֹן <S%H8111><s%> of Samaria וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> מִשְׁקֹ֖לֶת <S%H4949><s%> and the plummet בֵּ֣ית <S%H1004><s%> of the house אַחְאָ֑ב <S%H256><s%> of Ahab וּמָחִ֨יתִי <S%H4229><s%> and I will wipe אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> יְרוּשָׁלִַ֜ם <S%H3389><s%> Jerusalem כַּֽאֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> one יִמְחֶ֤ה <S%H4229><s%> as [a man] wipeth אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַצַּלַּ֙חַת֙ <S%H6747><s%> a dish מָחָ֔ה <S%H4229><s%> wiping וְהָפַ֖ךְ <S%H2015><s%> [it] and turning עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> over פָּנֶֽיהָ׃ <S%H6440><s%> [it] upside down

וְנָטַשְׁתִּ֗י <S%H5203><s%> And I will forsake אֵ֚ת <S%H853><s%> שְׁאֵרִ֣ית <S%H7611><s%> the remnant נַחֲלָתִ֔י <S%H5159><s%> of mine inheritance וּנְתַתִּ֖ים <S%H5414><s%> and deliver בְּיַ֣ד <S%H3027><s%> them into the hand אֹֽיְבֵיהֶ֑ם <S%H341><s%> of their enemies וְהָי֥וּ <S%H1961><s%> will become לְבַ֛ז <S%H957><s%> and they shall become a prey וְלִמְשִׁסָּ֖ה <S%H4933><s%> and a spoil לְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> to all אֹיְבֵיהֶֽם׃ <S%H341><s%> to all their enemies

יַ֗עַן <S%H3282><s%> because אֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> they עָשׂ֤וּ <S%H6213><s%> Because they have done אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הָרַע֙ <S%H7451><s%> [that which was] evil בְּעֵינַ֔י <S%H5869><s%> in my sight וַיִּהְי֥וּ <S%H1961><s%> been מַכְעִסִ֖ים <S%H3707><s%> me to anger אֹתִ֑י <S%H853><s%> מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> and have provoked הַיּ֗וֹם <S%H3117><s%> since the day אֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> after יָצְא֤וּ <S%H3318><s%> came forth אֲבוֹתָם֙ <S%H1><s%> their fathers מִמִּצְרַ֔יִם <S%H4714><s%> out of Egypt וְעַ֖ד <S%H5704><s%> against הַיּ֥וֹם <S%H3117><s%> even unto this day הַזֶּֽה׃ <S%H2088><s%> to this

וְגַם֩ <S%H1571><s%> Moreover דָּ֨ם <S%H1818><s%> blood נָקִ֜י <S%H5355><s%> innocent שָׁפַ֤ךְ <S%H8210><s%> shed מְנַשֶּׁה֙ <S%H4519><s%> Moreover Manasseh הַרְבֵּ֣ה <S%H7235><s%> much מְאֹ֔ד <S%H3966><s%> very עַ֛ד <S%H5704><s%> with אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> which מִלֵּ֥א <S%H4390><s%> till he had filled אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> יְרוּשָׁלִַ֖ם <S%H3389><s%> Jerusalem פֶּ֣ה <S%H6310><s%> from one end לָפֶ֑ה <S%H6310><s%> to another לְבַ֤ד <S%H905><s%> alone מֵֽחַטָּאתוֹ֙ <S%H2403><s%> beside his sin אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> which הֶחֱטִ֣יא <S%H2398><s%> to sin אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> יְהוּדָ֔ה <S%H3063><s%> wherewith he made Judah לַעֲשׂ֥וֹת <S%H6213><s%> in doing הָרַ֖ע <S%H7451><s%> [that which was] evil בְּעֵינֵ֥י <S%H5869><s%> in the sight יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD

וְיֶ֨תֶר <S%H3499><s%> Now the rest דִּבְרֵ֤י <S%H1697><s%> of the acts מְנַשֶּׁה֙ <S%H4519><s%> of Manasseh וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> and all אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> which עָשָׂ֔ה <S%H6213><s%> and all that he did וְחַטָּאת֖וֹ <S%H2403><s%> and his sin אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> which חָטָ֑א <S%H2398><s%> that he sinned הֲלֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> not הֵ֣ם <S%H1992><s%> like כְּתוּבִ֗ים <S%H3789><s%> [are] they not written עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> in סֵ֛פֶר <S%H5612><s%> in the book דִּבְרֵ֥י <S%H1697><s%> of the acts הַיָּמִ֖ים <S%H3117><s%> age לְמַלְכֵ֥י <S%H4428><s%> of the kings יְהוּדָֽה׃ <S%H3063><s%> Judah

וַיִּשְׁכַּ֤ב <S%H7901><s%> slept מְנַשֶּׁה֙ <S%H4519><s%> And Manasseh עִם־ <S%H5973><s%> with אֲבֹתָ֔יו <S%H1><s%> with his fathers וַיִּקָּבֵ֥ר <S%H6912><s%> and was buried בְּגַן־ <S%H1588><s%> in the garden בֵּית֖וֹ <S%H1004><s%> of his own house בְּגַן־ <S%H1588><s%> in the garden עֻזָּ֑א <S%H5798><s%> of Uzza וַיִּמְלֹ֛ךְ <S%H4427><s%> reigned אָמ֥וֹן <S%H526><s%> and Amon בְּנ֖וֹ <S%H1121><s%> his son תַּחְתָּֽיו׃ <S%H8478><s%> his place פ

בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> old עֶשְׂרִ֨ים <S%H6242><s%> [was] twenty וּשְׁתַּ֤יִם <S%H8147><s%> and two שָׁנָה֙ <S%H8141><s%> years אָמ֣וֹן <S%H526><s%> Amon בְּמָלְכ֔וֹ <S%H4427><s%> when he began to reign וּשְׁתַּ֣יִם <S%H8147><s%> two שָׁנִ֔ים <S%H8141><s%> years מָלַ֖ךְ <S%H4427><s%> and he reigned בִּירוּשָׁלִָ֑ם <S%H3389><s%> in Jerusalem וְשֵׁ֣ם <S%H8034><s%> name אִמּ֔וֹ <S%H517><s%> And his mother's מְשֻׁלֶּ֥מֶת <S%H4922><s%> [was] Meshullemeth בַּת־ <S%H1323><s%> the daughter חָר֖וּץ <S%H2743><s%> of Haruz מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> at יָטְבָֽה׃ <S%H3192><s%> of Jotbah

וַיֵּ֕לֶךְ <S%H1980><s%> walked in בְּכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> all הַדֶּ֖רֶךְ <S%H1870><s%> in all the way אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> after הָלַ֣ךְ <S%H1980><s%> had walked אָבִ֑יו <S%H1><s%> that his father וַֽיַּעֲבֹ֗ד <S%H5647><s%> and served אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַגִּלֻּלִים֙ <S%H1544><s%> the idols אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> after עָבַ֣ד <S%H5647><s%> served אָבִ֔יו <S%H1><s%> that his father וַיִּשְׁתַּ֖חוּ <S%H7812><s%> and worshipped לָהֶֽם׃
